# fetchAllRecordZonesOperation()

**Type Method**

Returns an operation for fetching all record zones in the current database.

## Declaration

```swift
class func fetchAllRecordZonesOperation() -> Self
```

## Discussion

Assign a value to the [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKFetchRecordZonesOperation/fetchRecordZonesCompletionBlock] property of the operation that this method returns so that you can process the results.
title: fetchAllRecordZonesOperation()
